name: updated_at
analysis or comment if misssing: used to sync with ElasticSearch for search

name: anonymize_on
type: The date on which all patient personal information will be anonymized

name: anonymized_at
type: The date on which all patient personal information has been anonymized

name: no_notifications_for_doctor_appointment
type: Allow email and sms optout on patients for doctor appointments

name: tanker_encrypted_ssn
type: The :tanker_encrypted_ssn column is used to store the social security number in different countries. It is INS (Identifiant national de santé) in France, (CoFi) Codice Fiscale in Italy. As of March 2021 it is not used in Germany. Irrespective of the name, if the usecase is the same, it is recommended that this column should be used!

name: given_names
type: PATIENTS ALL FIRST NAMES LIST | USED FOR INS VERIFICATION

name: acknowledged_at
type: features: PATIENT IDENTITY MANAGEMENT | MASTER PATIENT

name: legal_gender
type: features: PATIENT IDENTITY MANAGEMENT | MASTER PATIENT

analysis or comment if misssing:
sur cette table, on peut vraiment faire ce qu'on veut,  on a la partie relationnelle qui est nécessaire (patient base, master patient), 
mais tout le reste, ce n'est que X data type documents sur le patient qu'on display au prat dans différent produit sans traitement particulier.
on peut faire découpage produit logique .
On peut diviser par 2 les index sur la table en virant les colonnes
